title: Requirements to build Pytorch on Windows
body_html:
Hi,

I'm trying to follow the instructions to build pytorch on Windows (10 Pro), and am encountering the following issues:

  • conda install can't find mkl-include
  • Is Visual Studio 17 Enterprise required? I dowloaded the Community Edition, but then call "%VS150COMNTOOLS%\vcvarsall.bat" x64 -vcvars_ver=14.11 fails.
  • Where can I download/install NVTX? Googling and searching on developer.nvidia.com didn't bring any results.

Thanks a lot,
E.
body_text:
Hi,
I'm trying to follow the instructions to build pytorch on Windows (10 Pro), and am encountering the following issues:

conda install can't find mkl-include
Is Visual Studio 17 Enterprise required? I dowloaded the Community Edition, but then call "%VS150COMNTOOLS%\vcvarsall.bat" x64 -vcvars_ver=14.11 fails.
Where can I download/install NVTX? Googling and searching on developer.nvidia.com didn't bring any results.

Thanks a lot,
E.
body:
Hi,

I'm trying to follow the [instructions](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch#from-source) to build pytorch on Windows (10 Pro), and am encountering the following issues:
* `conda install` can't find `mkl-include`
* Is Visual Studio 17 Enterprise required? I dowloaded the Community Edition, but then `call "%VS150COMNTOOLS%\vcvarsall.bat" x64 -vcvars_ver=14.11` fails.
* Where can I download/install NVTX? Googling and searching on developer.nvidia.com didn't bring any results.

Thanks a lot,
E.
